objectives.text: Complete photo gallery app with category-based organization. Iterations 0-2 completed (MWS, ViewPager2, Dynamic Loading). Ready for Iteration 3: Category Concept.

insights.text: Iterations 0-2 completed successfully. MWS established (single image), ViewPager2 navigation implemented (multi-image swipe), and dynamic loading from assets added (file system integration). Project ready for Iteration 3: Category Concept implementation.

Key achievements: F0001-F0009 features completed, 35% test coverage achieved, working baseline at commit 704acda. Technical foundation solid with ViewPager2, dynamic asset loading, and comprehensive error handling.

Iteration 3 Complete: Category Concept implemented successfully. Navigation working, UI child-friendly, tests passing. Critical fixes applied after adversarial review. Ready for Iteration 4: Database Integration.

critical: Iterations 0-2 completed successfully. MWS established (single image), ViewPager2 navigation implemented (multi-image swipe), and dynamic loading from assets added (file system integration). Project ready for Iteration 3: Category Concept implementation.
